title: The Righteous Will Rejoice in Zion
html:
Isaiah invites all people to join with Zion:

10 "Rejoice with Jerusalem and be glad for her,

all you who love her;

rejoice greatly with her,

all you who mourn over her." (NIV)

Note that the people who associate with Zion will be those who love her and mourn over her. In other words, they will be close to Zion and sensitive to her earlier suffering, probably because they themselves experienced it.
